plot: The finale of Ami's story from the original Cream Lemon series. Ami's sad after her stepbrother Hiroshi briefly returned from London to tell her that they should end their romance. To cheer her up, her friends propose a trip to Hokkaido a week later to celebrate Ami's birthday. During the week, Ami can't chat with her stepmom, learns of her dad's divorce proposal and quits her idol career when she can't recognize herself in her own work. Wanting to talk, Ami meets Kono, who tries to seduce her, so Ami realizes that he only sees her as a sexfriend and splits with him. Later, Ami tries again to talk with her mom, but she chastises Ami. Focusing on her trip, Ami takes a book titled First Love from her brother's room and finds a photo of her with a thought written on it: "If Ami weren't my sister..." Realizing Hiroshi's true feelings and her own, the next day, instead of her planned trip, Ami goes to London, shedding her insecure teenage self to become a woman who knows what she wants.
ending_theme: "Tabidachi no Theme" (旅立ちのテーマ) by Ami
